name: Dream Escape (itch) (robbossmango89)
description:
A 3D adventure/platformer game made for a college class. Made with a team with different experience in Unity and game development.

Controls:
WASD - Move character
Space key - Jump
Hold Right Mouse Button - Camera control
ScrollWheel - Zoom camera in/out
ESC key - Go back to main menu

Made with free assets from unity store, blender for some models, and Mixamo for player model and animations.
